question: The passengers returning from which country are to be screened for novel Corona virus (nCov), in selected Indian airports?
explanation:
For nearly three weeks, China is hit by a new viral disease which was reported to spread by novel Corona virus (nCov). It killed one person and infected more than 40 in the country. Two other people in Japan and Thailand who had travelled to China were also infected by the virus. Recently, the Union Health Ministry instructed the airport authorities of Delhi, Mumbai and Kolkata to screen passengers returning from China and to check through thermal scanners if they carry the virus.
Coronaviruses are a large family of viruses, that cause diseases such as the Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) and Severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS).
